api_firstLoginWarn: This is your first login, go to Settings to change your password.
api_firstLogin: Go to Settings to create your first board.
api_attachmentFailed: Error adding attachment. Please try again.
api_uploadFailed: Error uploading attachment. Please try again.
api_attachmentPermission: You do not have sufficient permissions to remove this attachment.
api_attachmentNoRemove: Error removing attachment. No attachment found for ID
api_actionError: Error adding automatic action. Please check your entries and try again.
api_actionRemoveError: Error removing action. No action found for ID
api_boardError: Error adding board. Please check your entries and try again.
api_boardUpdateError: Error updating board. Please check your entries and try again.
api_boardRemoveError: Error removing board. No board found for ID
api_columnError: Error adding column. Please try again.
api_columnUpdateError: Error updating column. Please try again.
api_columnRemoveError: Error removing column. No column found for ID
api_commentError: Error adding comment. Please try again.
api_commentUpdateError: Error updating comment. Please try again.
api_commentRemoveError: Error removing comment. No comment found for ID
api_taskError: Error adding task. Please check your entries and try again.
api_taskUpdateError: Error updating task. Please try again.
api_taskRemoveError: Error removing task. No task found for ID
api_taskAutoColor: Task color changed by automatic action.
api_taskAutoCategory: Task categories changed by automatic action.
api_taskAutoAssignee: Task assignees changed by automatic action.
api_taskAutoDate: Task due date cleared by automatic action.
api_userError: Error adding user. Please check your entries and try again.
api_userUpdateError: Error updating user. Please check your entries and try again.
api_userOptError: Error updating user options. Please check your entries and try again.
api_userRemoveError: Error removing user. No user found for ID
api_usernameExists: Username already exists. Change the username and try again.
api_userBadPword: Error updating user. Incorrect current password.
mail_template_newTask:
%username% added a task in board %boardName%.
Task: %taskName%
Description: %taskDescription%
Due Date: %taskDueDate%
Asignees: %taskAssignees%
Categories: %taskCategories%
Points: %taskPoints%
Column: %taskColumnName%
Position: %taskPosition%
